id.dldescription: Unique Id of the animal event

animalId.dldescription: Unique Id of the related animal

herdEventId.dldescription: Unique Id of the related herd event

pregnancyCheckMethod.dldescription: Method used for the pregnancy check (Rectal, Progesterone Test, Ultrasound, etc)

pregnancyCheckResult.dldescription: Results of the pregnancy check (Not Pregnant, Pregnant, Unclear, Aborted)
